titleStmt.title: The natural history of the principality of Wales in three parts ... together with the natural and artificial rarities and wonders in the several counties of that principality / by R.B.
titleStmt.author: R. B., 1632?-1725?

biblFull.extent: 181 p., [1] folded leaf of plates : ill.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.

I. A brief account of the antient kings and princes of Brittain and Wales till the final extinguishing of the royal Brittish line--II. Remarks upon the lives of all the princes of Wales till the final extinguishing of the royal Brittish line--II. Remarks upon the lives of all the princes of Wales, or, the royal families of England, from K. Edward the first to this time--III. Remarkable observations on the most memorable persons and places in Wales & of many considerable transactions & passages that have happen'd therein for many hundred years past.
